entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @LouDobbs @TrumpGirlDebbie @realDonaldTrump I don't know how reliable this information is, but it suggests to me the possibility that covid-19 was engineered and released by China on purpose, coordinated with WHO and political operatives to do maximum damage, and can easily be done again unless there is retribution.
